name: ghosts: hide+seek!
description:
Your a ghost in a spooky maze, playing hide+seek with other ghosts! Inspired by Pac-Man.

An online game conceived of by ida kenna

with contributions by Jennifer Otzoy, James Sahli, Daniel Balthazar and Michael Peters

ida - project lead, game and network programming, UI design

Jennifer - UI design, chat programming, network programming - https://jenniferotzoy.itch.io/

James - art lead, animations, game and network programming

Daniel - level design, game programming, UI design - https://bluegamer410.itch.io/

Michael - level design, UI design

Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)
